page.title: 17ATTITUDES OF WALTON PEOPLE
page.content: We asked 56 people their attitudes towards Walton. Their answers depended on whether they lived there or not. People who live in Walton, do so because they either work there or like the town.They like the town because it is a friendly,peaceful place and they like the sea. To improve Walton many people wanted a sports centre built along with more facilities for the young. People we asked who did not live in Walton had come mainly either to work or to shop. Most people had come from nearby Frinton. Many people would improve Walton by building more shops.
